body_html:
Are you using floating point number model?

Yes.

If yes, that's expected behavior.

Good to know. However, I cannot find any docs or think of why there's a limitation on floating point numbers. Could you point out the technical reason behind this?

Thanks!

body:
> Are you using floating point number model?

Yes.

> If yes, that's expected behavior.

Good to know. However, I cannot find any docs or think of why there's a limitation on floating point numbers. Could you point out the technical reason behind this?

Thanks!
